pages.text: A Boline is a mundane tool whose main purpose it to collect ingredients. The tool acts as $(item)Shears$(), but will also harvest $(item)Cobweb$() without dropping it as $(item)String$(). The Boline can also harvest $(l:constructs/traps/blood_poppy)Blood Poppies$(/l) and $(l:constructs/traps/trapped_plants)Trapped Plants$(/l).

pages.title: Other uses
pages.text: The Boline can also be used a weapon, albeit very weak, but can be enchanted. The Boline can also be used in $(l:)Circle Magic$(/l) for rites connected with Necromancy.
